import React from "react"; import IngredienstList from "./IngredienstList"; const RecipeContext = React.createContext(); export default function Recipe({ recipe, handleRecipeDelete }) { const { id, name, cookTime, servings, instructions, ingredients } = recipe; return (

{name}

Cook Time: {cookTime}
Servings: {servings}
Instructions:
{instructions}
Ingredients:
); }
